create_ikfast_moveit_plugin.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #! /usr/bin/env python
2 from __future__ import print_function
3 
4 """
5 IKFast Plugin Generator for MoveIt
6 
7 Creates a kinematics plugin using the output of IKFast from OpenRAVE.
8 This plugin and the move_group node can be used as a general
9 kinematics service, from within the moveit planning environment, or in
10 your own ROS node.
11 
12 Author: Dave Coleman, PickNik Robotics
13  Michael Lautman, PickNik Robotics
14  Based heavily on the arm_kinematic_tools package by Jeremy Zoss, SwRI
15  and the arm_navigation plugin generator by David Butterworth, KAIST
16 
17 Date: March 2013
18 
19 """
20 """
21 Copyright (c) 2013, Jeremy Zoss, SwRI
22 All rights reserved.
23 
24 Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without
25 modification, are permitted provided that the following conditions are met:
26 
27 * Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright
28 notice, this list of conditions and the following disclaimer.
29 * Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright
30 notice, this list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the
31 documentation and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
32 * Neither the name of the Willow Garage, Inc. nor the names of its
33 contributors may be used to endorse or promote products derived from
34 this software without specific prior written permission.
35 
36 THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND CONTRIBUTORS "AS IS"
37 AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE
38 IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE
39 ARE DISCLAIMED. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT OWNER OR CONTRIBUTORS BE
40 IABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR
41 CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, PROCUREMENT OF
42 SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR PROFITS; OR BUSINESS
43 INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY, WHETHER IN
44 CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE)
45 ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE
46 POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
47 """

49 import re
50 import os
51 import yaml
52 from lxml import etree
53 from getpass import getuser
54 import shutil
55 import argparse
56 
57 try:
58  from roslib.packages import get_pkg_dir, InvalidROSPkgException
59 except ImportError:
60  print("Failed to import roslib. No ROS environment available? Trying without.")
61  # define stubs
62  class InvalidROSPkgException(Exception):
63  pass
64 
65  def get_pkg_dir(pkg_name):
66  raise InvalidROSPkgException("Failed to locate ROS package {}".format(pkg_name))

68 
69 # Package containing this file
70 plugin_gen_pkg = "moveit_kinematics"
71 # Allowed search modes, see SEARCH_MODE enum in template file
72 search_modes = ["OPTIMIZE_MAX_JOINT", "OPTIMIZE_FREE_JOINT"]

74 
75 def create_parser():
76  parser = argparse.ArgumentParser(
77  description="Generate an IKFast MoveIt kinematic plugin"
78  )
79  parser.add_argument("robot_name", help="The name of your robot")
80  parser.add_argument(
81  "planning_group_name",
82  help="The name of the planning group for which your IKFast solution was generated",
83  )
84  parser.add_argument(
85  "ikfast_plugin_pkg",
86  help="The name of the MoveIt IKFast Kinematics Plugin to be created/updated",
87  )
88  parser.add_argument(
89  "base_link_name",
90  help="The name of the base link that was used when generating your IKFast solution",
91  )
92  parser.add_argument(
93  "eef_link_name",
94  help="The name of the end effector link that was used when generating your IKFast solution",
95  )
96  parser.add_argument(
97  "ikfast_output_path",
98  help="The full path to the analytic IK solution output by IKFast",
99  )
100  parser.add_argument(
101  "--search_mode",
102  default=search_modes[0],
103  help="The search mode used to solve IK for robots with more than 6DOF",
104  )
105  parser.add_argument(
106  "--srdf_filename", help="The name of your robot. Defaults to <robot_name>.srdf"
107  )
108  parser.add_argument(
109  "--robot_name_in_srdf",
110  help="The name of your robot as defined in the srdf. Defaults to <robot_name>",
111  )
112  parser.add_argument(
113  "--moveit_config_pkg",
114  help="The robot moveit_config package. Defaults to <robot_name>_moveit_config",
115  )
116  return parser
117 
118 
119 def populate_optional(args):
120  if args.srdf_filename is None:
121  args.srdf_filename = args.robot_name + ".srdf"
122  if args.robot_name_in_srdf is None:
123  args.robot_name_in_srdf = args.robot_name
124  if args.moveit_config_pkg is None:
125  args.moveit_config_pkg = args.robot_name + "_moveit_config"
126 
127 
128 def print_args(args):
129  print("Creating IKFastKinematicsPlugin with parameters: ")
130  print(" robot_name: %s" % args.robot_name)
131  print(" base_link_name: %s" % args.base_link_name)
132  print(" eef_link_name: %s" % args.eef_link_name)
133  print(" planning_group_name: %s" % args.planning_group_name)
134  print(" ikfast_plugin_pkg: %s" % args.ikfast_plugin_pkg)
135  print(" ikfast_output_path: %s" % args.ikfast_output_path)
136  print(" search_mode: %s" % args.search_mode)
137  print(" srdf_filename: %s" % args.srdf_filename)
138  print(" robot_name_in_srdf: %s" % args.robot_name_in_srdf)
139  print(" moveit_config_pkg: %s" % args.moveit_config_pkg)
140  print("")

142 
143 def update_deps(reqd_deps, req_type, e_parent):
144  curr_deps = [e.text for e in e_parent.findall(req_type)]
145  missing_deps = set(reqd_deps) - set(curr_deps)
146  for dep in missing_deps:
147  etree.SubElement(e_parent, req_type).text = dep
148 
149 
150 def validate_openrave_version(args):
151  if not os.path.exists(args.ikfast_output_path):
152  raise Exception("Can't find IKFast source code at " + args.ikfast_output_path)
153 
154  # Detect version of IKFast used to generate solver code
155  solver_version = 0
156  with open(args.ikfast_output_path, "r") as src:
157  for line in src:
158  if line.startswith("/// ikfast version"):
159  line_search = re.search("ikfast version (.*) generated", line)
160  if line_search:
161  solver_version = int(line_search.group(1), 0) & ~0x10000000
162  break
163  print("Found source code generated by IKFast version %s" % str(solver_version))
164 
165  # Chose template depending on IKFast version
166  if solver_version >= 56:
167  setattr(args, "template_version", 61)
168  else:
169  raise Exception("This converter requires IKFast 0.5.6 or newer.")
170 
171 
172 def xmlElement(name, text=None, **attributes):
173  e = etree.Element(name, **attributes)
174  e.text = text
175  return e
176 
177 
178 def create_ikfast_package(args):
179  try:
180  setattr(args, "ikfast_plugin_pkg_path", get_pkg_dir(args.ikfast_plugin_pkg))
181  except InvalidROSPkgException:
182  args.ikfast_plugin_pkg_path = os.path.abspath(args.ikfast_plugin_pkg)
183  print(
184  "Failed to find package: %s. Will create it in %s."
185  % (args.ikfast_plugin_pkg, args.ikfast_plugin_pkg_path)
186  )
187  # update pkg name to basename of path
188  args.ikfast_plugin_pkg = os.path.basename(args.ikfast_plugin_pkg_path)
189 
190  src_path = args.ikfast_plugin_pkg_path + "/src/"
191  if not os.path.exists(src_path):
192  os.makedirs(src_path)
193 
194  include_path = args.ikfast_plugin_pkg_path + "/include/"
195  if not os.path.exists(include_path):
196  os.makedirs(include_path)
197 
198  # Create package.xml
199  pkg_xml_path = args.ikfast_plugin_pkg_path + "/package.xml"
200  if not os.path.exists(pkg_xml_path):
201  root = xmlElement("package", format="2")
202  root.append(xmlElement("name", text=args.ikfast_plugin_pkg))
203  root.append(xmlElement("version", text="0.0.0"))
204  root.append(
205  xmlElement("description", text="IKFast plugin for " + args.robot_name)
206  )
207  root.append(xmlElement("license", text="BSD"))
208  user_name = getuser()
209  root.append(
210  xmlElement("maintainer", email="%s@todo.todo" % user_name, text=user_name)
211  )
212  root.append(xmlElement("buildtool_depend", text="catkin"))
213  etree.ElementTree(root).write(
214  pkg_xml_path, xml_declaration=True, pretty_print=True, encoding="UTF-8"
215  )
216  print("Created package.xml at: '%s'" % pkg_xml_path)
217 
218 
219 def find_template_dir():
220  for candidate in [os.path.dirname(__file__) + "/../templates"]:
221  if os.path.exists(candidate) and os.path.exists(candidate + "/ikfast.h"):
222  return os.path.realpath(candidate)
223  try:
224  return os.path.join(
225  get_pkg_dir(plugin_gen_pkg), "ikfast_kinematics_plugin/templates"
226  )
227  except InvalidROSPkgException:
228  raise Exception("Can't find package %s" % plugin_gen_pkg)
229 
230 
231 def update_ikfast_package(args):
232  # Copy the source code generated by IKFast into our src folder
233  src_path = args.ikfast_plugin_pkg_path + "/src/"
234  solver_file_path = (
235  src_path
236  + args.robot_name
237  + "_"
238  + args.planning_group_name
239  + "_ikfast_solver.cpp"
240  )
241  if not os.path.exists(solver_file_path) or not os.path.samefile(
242  args.ikfast_output_path, solver_file_path
243  ):
244  shutil.copy2(args.ikfast_output_path, solver_file_path)
245 
246  if not os.path.exists(solver_file_path):
247  raise Exception(
248  "Failed to copy IKFast source code from '%s' to '%s'\n"
249  "Manually copy the source file generated by IKFast to this location and re-run"
250  % (args.ikfast_output_path, solver_file_path)
251  )
252  # Remember ikfast solver file for update of MoveIt package
253  args.ikfast_output_path = solver_file_path
254 
255  # Get template folder location
256  template_dir = find_template_dir()
257 
258  # namespace for the plugin
259  setattr(args, "namespace", args.robot_name + "_" + args.planning_group_name)
260  replacements = dict(
261  _ROBOT_NAME_=args.robot_name,
262  _GROUP_NAME_=args.planning_group_name,
263  _SEARCH_MODE_=args.search_mode,
264  _EEF_LINK_=args.eef_link_name,
265  _BASE_LINK_=args.base_link_name,
266  _PACKAGE_NAME_=args.ikfast_plugin_pkg,
267  _NAMESPACE_=args.namespace,
268  )
269 
270  # Copy ikfast header file
271  copy_file(
272  template_dir + "/ikfast.h",
273  args.ikfast_plugin_pkg_path + "/include/ikfast.h",
274  "ikfast header file",
275  )
276  # Create ikfast plugin template
277  copy_file(
278  template_dir
279  + "/ikfast"
280  + str(args.template_version)
281  + "_moveit_plugin_template.cpp",
282  args.ikfast_plugin_pkg_path
283  + "/src/"
284  + args.robot_name
285  + "_"
286  + args.planning_group_name
287  + "_ikfast_moveit_plugin.cpp",
288  "ikfast plugin file",
289  replacements,
290  )
291 
292  # Create plugin definition .xml file
293  ik_library_name = args.namespace + "_moveit_ikfast_plugin"
294  plugin_def = etree.Element("library", path="lib/lib" + ik_library_name)
295  setattr(args, "plugin_name", args.namespace + "/IKFastKinematicsPlugin")
296  cl = etree.SubElement(
297  plugin_def,
298  "class",
299  name=args.plugin_name,
300  type=args.namespace + "::IKFastKinematicsPlugin",
301  base_class_type="kinematics::KinematicsBase",
302  )
303  desc = etree.SubElement(cl, "description")
304  desc.text = (
305  "IKFast{template} plugin for closed-form kinematics of {robot} {group}".format(
306  template=args.template_version,
307  robot=args.robot_name,
308  group=args.planning_group_name,
309  )
310  )
311 
312  # Write plugin definition to file
313  plugin_file_name = ik_library_name + "_description.xml"
314  plugin_file_path = args.ikfast_plugin_pkg_path + "/" + plugin_file_name
315  etree.ElementTree(plugin_def).write(
316  plugin_file_path, xml_declaration=True, pretty_print=True, encoding="UTF-8"
317  )
318  print("Created plugin definition at '%s'" % plugin_file_path)
319 
320  # Create CMakeLists file
321  replacements.update(dict(_LIBRARY_NAME_=ik_library_name))
322  copy_file(
323  template_dir + "/CMakeLists.txt",
324  args.ikfast_plugin_pkg_path + "/CMakeLists.txt",
325  "cmake file",
326  replacements,
327  )
328 
329  # Add plugin export to package manifest
330  parser = etree.XMLParser(remove_blank_text=True)
331  package_file_name = args.ikfast_plugin_pkg_path + "/package.xml"
332  package_xml = etree.parse(package_file_name, parser).getroot()
333 
334  # Make sure at least all required dependencies are in the depends lists
335  build_deps = [
336  "liblapack-dev",
337  "moveit_core",
338  "pluginlib",
339  "roscpp",
340  "tf2_kdl",
341  "tf2_eigen",
342  ]
343  run_deps = ["liblapack-dev", "moveit_core", "pluginlib", "roscpp"]
344 
345  update_deps(build_deps, "build_depend", package_xml)
346  update_deps(run_deps, "exec_depend", package_xml)
347 
348  # Check that plugin definition file is in the export list
349  new_export = etree.Element("moveit_core", plugin="${prefix}/" + plugin_file_name)
350 
351  export_element = package_xml.find("export")
352  if export_element is None:
353  export_element = etree.SubElement(package_xml, "export")
354 
355  found = False
356  for el in export_element.findall("moveit_core"):
357  found = etree.tostring(new_export) == etree.tostring(el)
358  if found:
359  break
360 
361  if not found:
362  export_element.append(new_export)
363 
364  # Always write the package xml file, even if there are no changes, to ensure
365  # proper encodings are used in the future (UTF-8)
366  etree.ElementTree(package_xml).write(
367  package_file_name, xml_declaration=True, pretty_print=True, encoding="UTF-8"
368  )
369  print("Wrote package.xml at '%s'" % package_file_name)
370 
371  # Create a script for easily updating the plugin in the future in case the plugin needs to be updated
372  easy_script_file_path = args.ikfast_plugin_pkg_path + "/update_ikfast_plugin.sh"
373  with open(easy_script_file_path, "w") as f:
374  f.write(
375  "search_mode="
376  + args.search_mode
377  + "\n"
378  + "srdf_filename="
379  + args.srdf_filename
380  + "\n"
381  + "robot_name_in_srdf="
382  + args.robot_name_in_srdf
383  + "\n"
384  + "moveit_config_pkg="
385  + args.moveit_config_pkg
386  + "\n"
387  + "robot_name="
388  + args.robot_name
389  + "\n"
390  + "planning_group_name="
391  + args.planning_group_name
392  + "\n"
393  + "ikfast_plugin_pkg="
394  + args.ikfast_plugin_pkg
395  + "\n"
396  + "base_link_name="
397  + args.base_link_name
398  + "\n"
399  + "eef_link_name="
400  + args.eef_link_name
401  + "\n"
402  + "ikfast_output_path="
403  + args.ikfast_output_path
404  + "\n\n"
405  + "rosrun moveit_kinematics create_ikfast_moveit_plugin.py\\\n"
406  + " --search_mode=$search_mode\\\n"
407  + " --srdf_filename=$srdf_filename\\\n"
408  + " --robot_name_in_srdf=$robot_name_in_srdf\\\n"
409  + " --moveit_config_pkg=$moveit_config_pkg\\\n"
410  + " $robot_name\\\n"
411  + " $planning_group_name\\\n"
412  + " $ikfast_plugin_pkg\\\n"
413  + " $base_link_name\\\n"
414  + " $eef_link_name\\\n"
415  + " $ikfast_output_path\n"
416  )
417 
418  print("Created update plugin script at '%s'" % easy_script_file_path)
419 
420 
421 def update_moveit_package(args):
422  try:
423  moveit_config_pkg_path = get_pkg_dir(args.moveit_config_pkg)
424  except InvalidROSPkgException:
425  raise Exception("Failed to find package: " + args.moveit_config_pkg)
426 
427  try:
428  srdf_file_name = moveit_config_pkg_path + "/config/" + args.srdf_filename
429  srdf = etree.parse(srdf_file_name).getroot()
430  except IOError:
431  raise Exception("Failed to find SRDF file: " + srdf_file_name)
432  except etree.XMLSyntaxError as err:
433  raise Exception(
434  "Failed to parse xml in file: %s\n%s" % (srdf_file_name, err.msg)
435  )
436 
437  if args.robot_name_in_srdf != srdf.get("name"):
438  raise Exception(
439  "Robot name in srdf ('%s') doesn't match expected name ('%s')"
440  % (srdf.get("name"), args.robot_name_in_srdf)
441  )
442 
443  groups = srdf.findall("group")
444  if len(groups) < 1:
445  raise Exception("No planning groups are defined in the SRDF")
446 
447  planning_group = None
448  for group in groups:
449  if group.get("name").lower() == args.planning_group_name.lower():
450  planning_group = group
451 
452  if planning_group is None:
453  raise Exception(
454  "Planning group '%s' not defined in the SRDF. Available groups: \n%s"
455  % (
456  args.planning_group_name,
457  ", ".join([group_name.get("name") for group_name in groups]),
458  )
459  )
460 
461  # Modify kinematics.yaml file
462  kin_yaml_file_name = moveit_config_pkg_path + "/config/kinematics.yaml"
463  with open(kin_yaml_file_name, "r") as f:
464  kin_yaml_data = yaml.safe_load(f)
465 
466  kin_yaml_data[args.planning_group_name]["kinematics_solver"] = args.plugin_name
467  with open(kin_yaml_file_name, "w") as f:
468  yaml.dump(kin_yaml_data, f, default_flow_style=False)
469 
470  print("Modified kinematics.yaml at '%s'" % kin_yaml_file_name)
471 
472 
473 def copy_file(src_path, dest_path, description, replacements=None):
474  if not os.path.exists(src_path):
475  raise Exception("Can't find %s at '%s'" % (description, src_path))
476 
477  if replacements is None:
478  replacements = dict()
479 
480  with open(src_path, "r") as f:
481  content = f.read()
482 
483  # replace templates
484  for key, value in replacements.items():
485  content = re.sub(key, value, content)
486 
487  with open(dest_path, "w") as f:
488  f.write(content)
489  print("Created %s at '%s'" % (description, dest_path))
490 
491 
492 def main():
493  parser = create_parser()
494  args = parser.parse_args()
495 
496  populate_optional(args)
497  print_args(args)
498  validate_openrave_version(args)
499  create_ikfast_package(args)
500  update_ikfast_package(args)
501  try:
502  update_moveit_package(args)
503  except Exception as e:
504  print("Failed to update MoveIt package:\n" + str(e))
505 
506 
507 if __name__ == "__main__":
508  main()
